Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Saint Lawrence
ShortDescription: Revised: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove and 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Keefe, 68th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to street blockage near 67th/Saint Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Baltimore
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th & Buffalo, due to street blockage near 87th/Baltimore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 90th and Buffalo, due to street blockage near 87th/Baltimore.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier police activity at Kedzie-Homan. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Kedzie-Homan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemon
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
